article_title: Pet food and accessories store opens in West Des Moines
article_text:
April Lawrence, left, has opened a second Bone-A-Patreat pet food, treat and toy store for cats and dogs. She is pictured here with employee Josh Roddrick at the new West Des Moines store. (Photo: Bone-A-Patreat/Special to the Register)

Bone-A-Patreat, a pet food, treat and toy store, has opened a store at 9250 University Ave. in West Des Moines.

This is the second location for owner April Lawrence. Her original Bone-A-Patreat is in the Uptown Shopping Center, 4110 University Ave. in Des Moines. The new shop, which is in West Des Moines’ Hawthorne Plaza, is about twice the size of the first store, she said.

Both shops offer all-natural pet food and treats, toys, collars, coats, beds and wild bird feed and supplies.

Hours at the West Des Moines store are 9 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. Monday through Thursday; 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Friday; and 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Saturday.

Call 515-518-3600, visit www.boneapatreat.com or find it on Facebook.

Read or Share this story: http://dmreg.co/1AcoINQ
